p: Markov Jumps analysis of M and L segments indicated virus introduction from Zimbabwe to the Central African Republic (posterior probabilities 0.51 and 0.64, respectively). Other movement patterns inferred included transitions from Zimbabwe to South Africa (posterior probabilities 0.59, 0.68, and 0.78 for S, M, and L, respectively). M and L segments revealed a single transition into West Africa, from the Central African Republic to Guinea.
